snippet: A deeply unpopular law in China that effectively gave men having sex with under-14s lighter criminal punishments than those who committed rape will be abolished, according to lawyers.
abstract: A deeply unpopular law in China that effectively gave men having sex with under-14s lighter criminal punishments than those who committed rape will be abolished, according to lawyers.

headline.main: China to End Loophole in Child Rape Law, Experts Say
